SEARCH
Package be.kdg.memorace.model

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
be.kdg.memorace.model.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object
A class for handling file input and output. Allows reading from and writing to log files, as well as writing player information to a CSV file.
Since:
08/12/2022
Author:
Vera Wise, Elias De Hondt

  • Method Details

    • readLog

      public static String[] readLog(String url) throws IOException
      Reads a log file and returns its contents as a String array.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the file to be read
      Returns:
      a String array containing the contents of the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • writeStartUpLog

      public static void writeStartUpLog(String filename, String message) throws IOException
      Writes a message to a log file with a timestamp.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to be written to
      message - the message to be written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • writeErrorLog

      public static void writeErrorLog(String filename, String errorMessage) throws IOException
      Writes an error message to a log file with a timestamp.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to be written to
      errorMessage - the error message to be written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • writePlayersLog

      public static void writePlayersLog(String filename, List<Player> players) throws IOException
      Writes player information to a CSV file, with one row per player.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to be written to
      players - a List of Player objects to be written to the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
